trans-unit.source: An in-memory collection of hash tables that allows the rapid lookup of designer elements by <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊資料表的記憶體中集合<xref:System.Type>。</xref:System.Type>可快速查閱設計工具項目

trans-unit.source: The metadata store contains custom attribute metadata, such as the association between designers and types.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料存放區包含自訂屬性的中繼資料，例如設計工具與型別之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes can be defined in an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> and added to the metadata store.
trans-unit.target: 自訂屬性可以定義於<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable>並加入至中繼資料存放區。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable>

trans-unit.source: After the attributes are added, they will appear in calls made to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 要加入屬性之後，它們將出現在<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>所進行的呼叫

trans-unit.source: Adds the given table to the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> object’s attribute store.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料表加入至目前<xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>物件的屬性存放區。

trans-unit.source: After the table is added, calls to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> will use attributes defined in the newly added table.
trans-unit.target: 加入資料表之後，呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>將使用新加入的資料表中定義的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Multiple tables can be added to the attribute store.
trans-unit.target: 屬性存放區，就可以加入多個資料表。

trans-unit.source: In the case of conflicts, attributes in the most recently added table are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生衝突，會使用最近加入的資料表中的屬性。
